constantValues: Transactions (also referred to as donations) represent payments from a constituent (i.e. donor, contact, account or organization) to the nonprofit.

definitions.description: Transactions (also referred to as donations) represent payments from a constituent (i.e. donor, contact, account or organization) to the nonprofit.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

members.name: currencyValueDate

constantValues: The date on which the transaction was made or agreed.

members.description: The date on which the transaction was made or agreed.

members.name: description
members.description: A description of the transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: disbursementChannel

constantValues: The channel through which the funds will flow for this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The channel through which the funds will flow for this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: financeType

constantValues: The type of finance (e.g. grant, loan, debt relief, etc.).

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The type of finance (e.g. grant, loan, debt relief, etc.).

foreignKeyAttribute.name: flowType

constantValues: Whether the transaction is funded by Official Development Assistance (ODA), Other Official Flows (OOF), etc.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Whether the transaction is funded by Official Development Assistance (ODA), Other Official Flows (OOF), etc.

members.name: humanitarian

constantValues: Indicates that this transaction relates entirely or partially to humanitarian aid.

members.description: Indicates that this transaction relates entirely or partially to humanitarian aid.

members.name: providerActivityIdentifier

constantValues: If incoming funds are being provided from the budget of another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

members.description: If incoming funds are being provided from the budget of another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: providerOrganization

constantValues: The organization from which the transaction originated.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The organization from which the transaction originated.

members.name: recipientActivityIdentifier

constantValues: If outgoing funds are being provided to another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

members.description: If outgoing funds are being provided to another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

members.name: recipientCountryDescription

constantValues: A description of the recipient country.

members.description: A description of the recipient country.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: recipientCountryId

constantValues: A country that will benefit from this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A country that will benefit from this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: recipientOrganizationId

constantValues: The organization receiving the money from the transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The organization receiving the money from the transaction.

members.name: recipientRegionDescription

constantValues: A description of the recipient region.

members.description: A description of the recipient region.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: recipientRegionId

constantValues: A region that will benefit from this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A region that will benefit from this transaction.

members.name: reference

constantValues: An internal reference linking this transaction back to the publishers financial management system.

members.description: An internal reference linking this transaction back to the publishers financial management system.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: tiedStatusId

constantValues: Whether the aid is untied, tied, or partially tied.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Whether the aid is untied, tied, or partially tied.

members.name: adjustmentComment

constantValues: Any notes or details about the adjustment that the user may have optionally entered.

members.description: Any notes or details about the adjustment that the user may have optionally entered.
